derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent. (in the general sense 'portion, share'): from Anglo-Norman French dividende, from Latin dividendum 'something to be divided', from the verb dividere (see divide)

entry.def: A dividend is the part of a company's profits which is paid to people who have shares in the company.

example.ex: The first quarter dividend has been increased by nearly 4 per cent.
example.tran: 第一季度的股息增长了近 4%。

entry.def: If something pays dividends, it brings advantages at a later date.

example.ex: Steps taken now to maximise your health will pay dividends later on.
example.tran: 现在采取措施增强体质会使你日后受益。

means.word_mean: 1. that part of the earnings of a corporation that is distributed to its shareholders; usually paid quarterly
2. a number to be divided by another number
3. a bonus; something extra (especially a share of a surplus)

auth_sentence.content: They tend to pay a fixed dividend in perpetuity.
auth_sentence.res_content: They tend to pay a fixed dividend in perpetuity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They tend to pay a fixed dividend in perpetuity.

auth_sentence.content: They want to see stable dividend-paying products as well.
auth_sentence.res_content: They want to see stable dividend-paying products as well.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They want to see stable dividend-paying products as well.

auth_sentence.content: So dividend taxes would nearly triple for some taxpayers.
auth_sentence.res_content: So dividend taxes would nearly triple for some taxpayers.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So dividend taxes would nearly triple for some taxpayers.

stems_affixes.word_buile: in不+divide[v.分开]+ual……的→不能分开的→个人的,单独的
e出+vid看,查+ent……的→看出来了→明显的
im不+provident[adj.顾及未来的,有远见的]→adj.不顾将来的,不节俭的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 惹人反感的,招人嫉妒的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不+vid看,查+ious……的→看上去不好的→有害的
pro向前+vid看+ent……的→向前看的→有远见的
provide预备,提供+ed→在……前提之下→倘若

stems_affixes.value_cn: 红利,股息;回报,效益;被除数,划分
stems_affixes.word_buile: divide[v.分开]+end→划分,区分[红利,股息也是划分出去的]
in不+divide[v.分开]+ual……的→不能分开的→个人的,单独的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 明显;显著;根据;证据;迹象
stems_affixes.word_buile: e出+vid看,查+ence表名词→看出来了→明显
pro向前+vid看+ency表名词→向前看→有远见

stems_affixes.value_cn: 电视, 录象, 视频
stems_affixes.word_buile: vid看,查+eo→n.电视, 录象, 视频

stems_affixes.value_cn: 供应,供给,准备,预防,规定
stems_affixes.word_buile: pro前,提前+vid看,查+e→提前看好→预备,提供

Sentence.sentence: Yet we know that difficulty can pay unexpected dividends.
Prices are good, crowds are fewer and the dividends like expanded worldview, lifelong memories, the satisfaction of boosting the global economy—can't be easily snatched away.

jushi.english: The company declared a large dividend at the end of the year.
jushi.chinese: 年底公司宣布红利甚丰。
